name: Yuri Ramos
message: Thalis is an excellent professional who stood out for his dedication and commitment. The requested project was executed with remarkable perfection, showcasing the excellence of the services he provided.

name: Jenifer Arispe
message: Collaborating with Thalis on a project was an extremely positive experience. Together, we were able to turn an abstract idea into something concrete and functional. He is a professional who stands out as a dedicated and committed colleague, with a motivation and passion for the field that are admirable.
